cleaned_text: Acupuncture can assist you to detoxify your body. To date~ this ancient Chinese healthcare system has helped millions of people feel more vibrant and energetic by eliminating toxins from the body. Detox Acupuncture also helps to boost the metabolism and enable your body to absorb more nutrients. Sterilized needles (which are finer than a human hair) are applied to specific energy points on the body. A complex system~ the goal of acupuncture is to ensure all energy lines remain free and clear~ thereby allowing the energy to move freely around the body. A must try for anyone who needs a boost! You must be 18 years of age to have an acupuncture treatment. Please see Terms and Conditions for additional treatment restrictions.
